translations: 海、空、陆地和水下目标（sea, air, land and underwater targets）

sentences.sentence: Women, when you once again salut wealth, hail fame and extol power.
sentences.translation: 女人啊，当你再度向财富致敬，向名利欢呼，向权力高举臂膀。

sentences.sentence: So, thank you to all of you for playing a part in this great and educational experience with me. Salut .
sentences.translation: 因此，感谢你们在座的所有在这个伟大而富于教育意义的经历中所扮演的角色，让我们干杯！
